```{python}
with open("/Users/lefie/301/hw4_files/conlang.txt") as f:
    text = f.read()
    
print(text)
```

```{python}
import re

words_all = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", text.lower().strip()) 
words_all = [w for w in words_all if w] 

print(words_all[:15])
```

```{python}
vowels = set("aeiouɜ")
words_v = []
words_no_v = []

for word in words_all:
    if any(ch in vowels for ch in word):
        words_v.append(word)
    else:
        words_no_v.append(word)
    
print("Words with vowels:", words_v)
print("Words without vowels:", words_no_v)
```

```{python}
print("First 30 words (with vowels):")
print(words_v[:30])
print()

print("Counts:")
print("  total tokens after edge-punct clean:", len(words_all))
print("  kept (has ≥1 vowel):", len(words_v))
print("  removed (no vowels):", len(words_no_v))
```
